featuresSection.title: In it for women since 1998.
featuresSection.subtitle: Since 1998, we have been building safe support for women, hope for children, and a healthy future for society.

cards.title: Child safety
cards.description: Children are the future of our society. We work for their safety, well-being, and development, providing support through protective and harmless interventions.

cards.title: Women Support
cards.description: Since 1998, “Clean World” Women's Aid Public Union has been providing thousands of women with legal assistance, psychological support, shelter, and reintegration services. In all our activities, we prioritize protecting women's dignity and ensuring no harm is done.

cards.title: Reliable action, ethical approach
cards.description: For over 25 years, “Clean World” has remained committed to ethical principles and the principle of doing no harm in the fight against human trafficking and gender-based violence. All our activities are built on transparency, respect for human dignity, and social responsibility.

highlightSections.title: Start a lifelong friendship
highlightSections.description: To support a child or a woman in a shelter means to light up their path in life. Every step taken here is unforgettable, because with love, hope, and care we become a family.

highlightSections.title: The impact we make — together
highlightSections.description: So much becomes possible when children grow up healthy, educated, skilled and safe wherever they are — at home, in school, in community and online. Together we’re helping them do exactly that.

cards.title: Child-focused
cards.description: We exist for children – and their voices and experiences guide everything we do. Each year, we reach millions of children and family members contending with poverty through programs that support them to create the conditions children need to thrive.

cards.title: Community-centered
cards.description: As a community development organization, we work hand in hand with local partner organizations to diminish the impact of poverty on children. Because local people know their own needs best.

cards.title: People-first
cards.description: We believe that people are people, no matter their circumstances or experiences, and that their value is intrinsic and immeasurable. We strive to honor the dignity of every child in our programs and every human being we meet, no matter what.

text.title: Here since 1998. Why? Because we need each other.
text.subtitle1: “Clean World” Women’s Aid Public Union (CW-WAPU) is a trusted service provider and leading advocate in the field of women’s rights protection and support for victims of human trafficking in Azerbaijan. We operate a shelter and rehabilitation center accredited by the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection, providing comprehensive services to Azerbaijani citizens and foreign nationals affected by human trafficking and gender-based violence.
text.subtitle2: Founded in 1998, CW-WAPU has become one of Azerbaijan’s leading organizations in service provision, legal reforms, and international advocacy initiatives. For over two decades, we have combined direct support services with systemic change initiatives, operating as a key civil society institution in this field.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Building an inclusive and safe society where every woman and child is free from violence, has access to justice, equal opportunities, and a life of dignity.

mission.title: Our Mission
points: To ensure the protection, empowerment, and rehabilitation of victims of human trafficking and violence.
To promote and support national and international efforts to eliminate exploitation and gender-based discrimination.

items.title: Thousands of women have received legal and psychological support.
items.desc: Our organization has provided rehabilitation and legal protection services with an individual approach for victims of trafficking and violence.

items.title: We manage one of Azerbaijan's first accredited shelters.
items.desc: Accredited by the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection, this shelter offers comprehensive support to trafficking victims.

items.title: We are one of the leading organizations contributing to national policy.
items.desc: We actively participated in the preparation and implementation of Azerbaijan's National Action Plan on Combating Human Trafficking.

items.title: We have built strong local and international partnerships.
items.desc: By collaborating with NGOs, advocacy networks, and international organizations, we have expanded our impact globally.

hero.subtitle: We provide reliable, people-centered services to ensure the safety, well-being and social integration of women and children.

cta.title: Need support?
cta.desc: Our team is ready to listen and offer solutions tailored to your needs.

items.title: Safety & Shelter
items.desc: Safe shelter for women and children affected by domestic violence; daily provision of food, clothing, hygiene items and bedding; heating, electricity, water and household conditions.

items.title: Psychological Support
items.desc: Psychological assistance for traumatized women and children; individual and group therapy for children; trainings to restore self-confidence and life skills for women.

items.title: Legal Aid
items.desc: Legal consultation; support with police and courts in cases of violence; assistance with preparing necessary documents to protect the rights of women and children.

items.title: Social Work & Integration
items.desc: Guidance for women to find jobs, attend vocational courses or education; ensuring children's consistent school attendance; assistance in accessing social benefits and aid.

items.title: Medical Services
items.desc: First medical aid; referrals to hospitals and clinics when needed; support for restoring mental and physical health.

items.title: Awareness & Development
items.desc: Trainings for women on life skills (profession, financial literacy, legal awareness); lessons, play and development programs for children; activities for adaptation to public life.
